mapper.select:
SELECT SORT_INDEX as "sortIndex", WHERE_CODE as "whereCode", GUID as "guid", WHERE_NAME as "whereName", CODE as "code", DESCRIBE as "describe", REMARK as "remark", CREATE_TIME as "createTime", CREATE_USER as "createUser", VALUE_TYPE as "valueType", VALUE_CODE as "valueCode", VALUE_SERVICE as "valueService", VALUE_METHOD as "valueMethod", BIZ_COMBOX_ID as "bizComboxId", BIZ_COMBOX_TEXT as "bizComboxText", EXTEND3 as "extend3", EXTEND4 as "extend4", EXTEND5 as "extend5", BIZ_COLUMNS as "bizColumns" FROM T_SYS_WHEREEX
and GUID = #{guid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_WHEREEX ( SORT_INDEX, WHERE_CODE, GUID, WHERE_NAME, CODE, DESCRIBE, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_CODE, VALUE_SERVICE, VALUE_METHOD, BIZ_COMBOX_ID, BIZ_COMBOX_TEXT, EXTEND3, EXTEND4, EXTEND5, BIZ_COLUMNS ) VALUES ( #{sortIndex, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler}, #{whereCode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{guid, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{whereName, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{describe, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{remark, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler}, #{createUser, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{valueType, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{valueCode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{valueService, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{valueMethod, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bizComboxId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bizComboxText, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{extend3, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{extend4, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{extend5, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{bizColumns, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SYS_WHEREEX
SORT_INDEX = #{sortIndex, jdbcType=NUMERIC,typeHandler=NumberHandler},
WHERE_CODE = #{whereCode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
GUID = #{guid, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WHERE_NAME = #{whereName, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CODE = #{code, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
DESCRIBE = #{describe, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
VALUE_TYPE = #{valueType, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
VALUE_CODE = #{valueCode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
VALUE_SERVICE = #{valueService, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
VALUE_METHOD = #{valueMethod, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BIZ_COMBOX_ID = #{bizComboxId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BIZ_COMBOX_TEXT = #{bizComboxText, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EXTEND3 = #{extend3, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EXTEND4 = #{extend4, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
EXTEND5 = #{extend5, jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
BIZ_COLUMNS = #{bizColumns, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
GUID = #{guid}
